about_the_game:
Explore the dark marine abysses in AquaDream, a captivating puzzle game. Take on the role of a brave anglerfish and solve complex puzzles in the heart of underwater labyrinths. Find hidden keys, activate towers to open new passages, and follow ocean currents precisely to avoid deadly traps.

But that's not all! Collect a variety of rare shells scattered throughout the levels to complete your personal collection. Each shell collected brings you one step closer to becoming the master of the depths.



  • Challenging puzzles in an immersive marine environment
  • Labyrinths to explore and secret passages to discover
  • Keys and towers to activate for progress
  • Traps to avoid and ocean currents to follow
  • A collection of rare shells to complete

Are you ready to take on the challenge and uncover the hidden secrets of the marine depths?

short_description: Dive into AquaDream! Guide your anglerfish through intricate underwater mazes. Collect stars, solve puzzles, and avoid perilous obstacles. Experience a captivating deep-sea adventure filled with hidden treasures and mysteries in this immersive aquatic world.
